Hello {!Opportunity.C_First_Name__c},
Thank you for choosing Bizfi for your business financing needs! You are minutes away from securing another round of working capital for your business! Whether you need the extra capital to expand or looking to bolster your marketing campaigns, Bizfi is here to fulfill those needs. We would like to get started right away on renewal options for you. Your dedicated refinance specialist is ready to get to work for you. The process is VERY simple! Upon replying to this email, a senior refinance specialist will contact you to go over the details. Please have your most recent business bank statements ready to ensure a quick turnaround time. Feel free to call us at the number below or email us at renewals@bizfi.com. We look forward to working with you again.
Sincerely, Renewals Department 450 Park Avenue South 6th Floor New York, NY 10016 P: 877.208.7678 E: http://www.bizfi.com
